snippet: Two Republican legislators are running for a rare open State Senate seat and, in the process, each is trying to persuade voters that he is more conservative than his opponent.
lead_paragraph: Two Republican legislators are running for a rare open State Senate seat and, in the process, each is trying to persuade voters that he is more conservative than his opponent.

headline.seo: Running for Texas Senate, Todd Smith and Kelly Hancock Strive to Out-Conservative Each Other
headline.main: Two Legislators Strive to Out-Conservative Each Other for a State Senate Seat
headline.print_headline: Two Legislators Strive to Out-Conservative Each Other for a State Senate Seat
